fullChargeAlarmDesc: Alert when battery reaches set level
lowBatteryAlarmDesc: Alert when battery drops below set level
optimalChargingDesc: Keep your battery between 20% and 80% for longer battery life.
avoidOverHeatDesc: Don't use your phone while charging to prevent excessive heat.
getStartedDesc: Get started by setting your charging preferences to protect your battery health.
chargeAlarmDetailedDesc: Get notified instantly when your phone reaches full charge to avoid overcharging and preserve battery health. Customize alert tone, vibration, and repeat options.
ringtoneDesc: Customize tone for charge alerts in your style.
